subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Red Wings defenseman Chris Chelios will be sidelined three to six weeks with a fractured shin bone. Chelios, 46, is the N.H.L.’s oldest player. He is entering his 25th N.H.L. season and his 10th with Detroit. Chelios was hurt in Tuesday night’s 2-1 preseason loss to Montreal.
